segments.text: I've read your resume and know a lot of things about your qualifications for this position . One thing you didn't mention is why you left your last job ? I know the company you worked for is a good company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it's a good company . But the management changed last month . We didn ’ t get along , so I quit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . Why would you like to join our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm qualified for this position . And I've heard a lot of good things about your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You take care of your employees . And your company offers good salaries and benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's good to know . Why do you think you ’ re qualified for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got over seven years ' experience working in this kind of position . I know I can do a good job in this position .
segments.speaker: S2
